metadata.title: CVE-2020-21428 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function LoadRGB in PluginDDS.cpp inFreeImage 3.18.0 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code and causeother impacts via crafted image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreeimage3 - 3.18.0+ds2-6ubuntu5.1
libfreeimageplus3 - 3.18.0+ds2-6ubuntu5.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freeimage package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.0+ds2-6ubuntu5.1').
